casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Brown, Appellant, v. Rhodes, Appellee.

[Cite as State ex rel. Brown v. Rhodes, 112 Ohio St.3d 153, 2006-Ohio-6523.]

(No. 2006-1549 Submitted November 14, 2006 Decided December 27, 2006.) Frank C. Brown Jr., pro se.

{¶ 1} The discretionary appeal is accepted on Proposition of Law Nos. I and III.

{¶ 2} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State ex rel. Russell v. Thornton, 111 Ohio St.3d 409, 2006-Ohio-5858, 856 N.E.2d 966.

Moyer, C.J., Resnick, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, O’Donnell and Lanzinger, JJ., concur. Pfeifer, J., dissents.
